channel.title: [UNOFFICIAL] Tournament for the Throne III
channel.description:
Competitive Throne of Lies is back for its third installment! The Tournament is a two-day event pitting the best Throne of lies players against each other to see who will come out with the title of _"Rightful King"_. The first round starts on February **17th** and the finals conclude on the **18th**. Prizes include at least **$75** in cash rewards, Throne Of Lies Keys, and more! Join the tournament here:
All the tournament rules and game times can be found here: If you have any questions please contact me on discord at "Lunamink" or in this forum thread :D
